113.content:
"How about that kid in the hot tub?"

Evan and Steve walk barefoot around the main part of the pool to the hot tub, where lonely Ryan is sitting. They both noticed as the walked in that when Ryan went to the main pool to play basketball with the other boys he wasn't picked for a team, and so he made his way over to the hot tub. However, as he said "Hi" and got in the other 3 boys who were in there got out right away, and Ryan slumped down onto the little ledge in the hot tub all by himself. Evan and Steve both thought Ryan could use a friend. Or two
The two boys get to the hot tub and stand outside of it.

"Hey dude, how's it going?" Steve asks cheerfully.

"Oh, hey guys. I'm ok, how are you?"

"Great!" Evan says with big grin across his tan face, showing his remarkably white teeth.

"We were actually wondering if we could join you in the hot tub. Can we?" Steve asks.

"Well...you want to? For some reason, people don't seem to want to be around me. I just moved here and no one seems to like me very much...are you sure you want to?" Ryan asks unhopefully.

"Of course we want to!" Evan exclaims!

"Yeah," Steve adds, "Those other guys are just jerks. Don't worry about them. I'd love to be your friend, it looks like you could use one!"

"Really?" Ryan asks

"Yeah, really!"

"You don't even know me!"

"Yeah, that's why we want to get to know you! I'm sure you are a great guy!"

"I'm sure too!" Evan adds.

"Alright...well..." Ryan lets out a little sigh of relief slash laugh, "yeah, yeah sure, come in! The water's nice!"

Evan and Steve smile at Ryan and make there way into the hot tub. They get in, and the three boys very soon afterwards head over to the snack stand to get some sodas and get to know each other at the tables over there. After about a half hour or so talking about Ryan's old hometown of Eugene, Oregon, Lakeland, North Carolina (what is now the hometown for the three of them), NFL, Community (which happens to be the favorite show amongst all of them), and how rainy the week had been up 'til today, the three of you decide to head back over to the hot tub. Ryan gets in first and sits on the side by the fence, Steve takes a spot on the opposite side of Ryan in the community's oval shaped 6 1/2 foot wide hot tub, and Evan takes a seat at the end, in between Steve and Ryan. After a minute or two more to finish the conversation about the season finale of Community, Steve states:

"You know Ryan, those other guys are idiots. I think you're really cool!"

"Wow, well, thanks Steve! I think you guys are really cool too, thanks for coming to talk to me!"

"No problem" Steve and Evan say in unison. As they do, they both notice, and maybe Ryan didn't notice, that Ryan's left foot was on top of Evans foot under the water, and his right was on top of Steve's. Steve and Evan glance over at each other.

Now that the three boys are all friends, this might be the time to ask Ryan about joining the Foothunters. What do you do?

Ryan is Tim’s best friend. Ryan is 10 years old, just like Tim, but is a few inches shorter and has size 6 ½ feet, a bit more normal than Tim’s massive size 9 ½ feet. Ryan has deep blue eyes, the deepest blue Tim’s ever seen (some of the girls at their school call Ryan “Photoshop” because his eyes are so blue it’s hard to believe), shaggy dirty blonde hair, a birth mark on his left ankle and a scar on his neck from when they were dirt biking together at a track in town and Ryan wiped out going off a jump. Ryan landed first and his bike landed second, on top of him, and part of the bike clipped the side of his neck slicing it open. It was just the side so it wasn’t anything life-threatening, just let out a respectable amount of blood and left a sweet scar.

All that stuff aside, Ryan is the perfect best friend. He’s funny, but not too funny to show that he cares about you and never takes anything too far. He is very talented, especially at guitar and drawing for only being 10 years old. He loves being Tim’s best friend just as much as Tim loves being his. The only hitch is that Ryan doesn’t know about Tim’s foot fetish.

Tim’s eyes have adjusted by now, and there they were hanging off the futon. Out from under a tan fleece blanket with some leaf design on it, from inside a pair of blue Nike sweatpants were Ryan’s feet. The little bit of light in the room glimmered off the tight skin on his toes and around the sides of his feet. He was lying on his back, his left leg extended all the way out so it was pointing right toward Tim, and the other crossed on the mattress so that his right sole was against his left knee. If only Ryan knew about Tim’s foot fetish. Or, perhaps rather, if only Tim had the courage to bring it up with Ryan. The fear of throwing a wrench in their great friendship kept him from ever telling Ryan about it, so he resorted to licking Ryan’s feet whenever they had a sleep over together. One other great thing about Ryan is that he’s the heaviest sleeper Tim knows!

Tim was kneeling, and moved about a foot closer to Ryan as he took a deep breath, trying to calm his shakes, and thought to himself:

“Let’s go.”

Grabbing Ryan’s extended left foot like it was a sandwich, with all of his fingers around the top of his foot and his thumbs on the bottom, he began rubbing his thumbs ever so quaintly into Ryan’s sole as he picked his foot up, lifting it towards his open mouth. He stuck Ryan’s first three toes into his mouth, his forth pinching the outside of his mouth, and began wagging his tongue back and forth the three toes and then sucked on them like they were three oddly-sized dum-dums. And not to mention that, had they been dum-dums, they’d be the best tasting dum-dums in the world.

Ryan’s feet tasted just like they always do, which is definitely a good thing. So salty, a little dirty because of how frequently he plays outside and how infrequently he takes a shower. But for as little as he showered, Ryan never smelled rank, just earthy. And heck, his feet tasted amazing because of it!

After a few minutes of tasting those three toes, and occasionally letting the other two slip in, Tim…
134121.title: The Best Friends

1432.content:
Mrs. Frost, a 60--something, stern librarian, was standing above them, in front of the table they were at.

"May I ask what you're doing?" She inquired sharply.

Robert stared at her, pale faced, and Nico was still under the table. After what seemed like forever without saying anything, Robert blurted out "I dropped my book!"
"And I went to get it" Nico added "And then we both moaned because I hit my head on the table and dropped the book on his barefoot right before you came over!" Nico got out from under the table, WITH a book that happend to have been left on an empty chair at the table, and sat back in his seat. "Sorry for being so load, ma'am."

The day is saved?

"First of all," She began, eyeing them down with daggers for eyes, "You should NOT be barefoot in a library. Second, that book is NOT property of this library, someone's name is markered in on the cover. WHY do you have that? I suggest you little thieves put it back where you found it. Lastly, if you MUST be so load, do NOT be so load in MY library. If I have to come over here again, I will escort you promptly to the door. Understood?"

"Yes ma'am!" The boys utterted together.

Mrs. Frost gave a little scoff, spun around, and returned to the back room.

So. What's the plan now?

143231.content:
The two of them head over to Robert's house, if you could call it that. Robert's parents are from Mexico, and his family immigrated to America when Robert was just a newborn. His father works at a company that manufactures all different kinds of pipes, mostly copper, and got transferred to a much bigger branch in America and has since become the company's vice-president. The family has been very well off ever since. To that credit, Robert's house was enormous. Its four stories, excluding the basement.

When the boys got there, no one else was home. His dad at work, mom out shopping with his sister, and his other brothers were all at other friends houses. Nico loved being at Robert's house, but he had only been there a handful of times before. As they stepped through the front door and Robert was about to slip his flip-flops off, Nico stopped him. Nico knelt down behind Robert, stuck his hand in-between Robert's left foot and flip-flop, and reached his head under Robert's legs and placed his lips on Robert's foot, giving it a kiss. Then he licked down Robert's foot, stuck his tongue under the flip-flop strap, and removed it. He sucked on Robert's big toe for a little bit too, making Robert giggle and moan with pleasure at the same time. Nico did the same thing with Robert's right foot. Once he was done, Nico looked up at Robert from under his legs and wishfully asked, "My turn?" Robert giggled, ruffled Nico's thin black hair and said "Oooh yeah. You're turn."

They smiled at each other and Robert asked Nico to sit up against the door. He did so, and Robert sat in front of him. "This is going to be a little tricky." Robert said. He then put both his feet on Nico's face and then slid them down so that his toes were by Nico's mouth. "So I think it's a good idea you warm my toes up...you know...to get them ready." Robert giggled out. Nico giggled too, through Robert's toes, and then ran his tongue through Robert's toes too, under all ten of ‘em.
“Oohhh” Robert moaned. “That feels soooo goooood!”
“Mmm” Nico let out. “They taste so good too!”
Back and forth he licked Robert’s toes, and sometimes he went through licking in between each and every toe as he worked his way down and up Robert’s feet. 10 minutes must have passed before Nico placed Robert’s feet on top of each other and did his best to get them into his mouth. He was kind of successful, but he resorted to licking Robert’s feet like this for a while too. After a few more minutes, Nico pushed Robert’s feet back.
“Sir, I think you’re feet are good and ready now!” Nico saluted him, drool all over his smiley, laughing mouth.
“Rogert that, good buddy!” Robert saluted him back, and then placed his bare feet on Nico’s left shoe. He then scrunched his toes up against his laces, trying to get a hold of them. Once he got a hold of both ends, he pulled them out, and started untying Nico’s shoe. This took a little while, but they didn’t mind. Once untied, Robert stuck his toes onto the shoes tongue under the laces and then flexed his toes up, loosening to the laces. Once the shoe was loose he popped off Nico’s sneaker, and then stuck his toes inside of Nico’s sock, peeling it off.

His feet smelled, but the thing about Nico is that when his feet start to smell, even people who don’t like feet don’t mind the smell. They smell good somehow, like grass. Nico plays Frisbee and soccer outside all the time on grass, shoes on or off, and some people credit that to their dirt, grass type smell. In any case, Robert sandwiched Nico’s foot with his feet, and tickled Nico’s foot for a bit in that position. Then he pulled his leg’s back, thus moving Nico’s foot closer to him and stuck his face in his foot, taking in it’s smell.
“You’re foot smells so good, Nico!” Robert said, hugging Nico’s foot against his nose. Nico blushed, and said “I know.” Robert was in a trance due to how in love he was with the smell of Nico’s feet. After a moment Nico added:
“But how do they taste?”

Nico shoved his toes into Robert’s mouth, where they would be sucked on for a good 5 minutes. “Even better!” Was Robert’s response to the question, and in the time Robert took sucking Nico’s toes, Nico pulled Robert’s right foot up to his mouth and returned the favor. Nico was so happy to have the Foothunter’s, and especially to have Robert as a friend. Robert felt the same way. They let each other know this on the walk over from the library, where they said how much they loved that they can do whatever they want to each other’s feet, and how much they loved each other’s feet in general.

After one last big slobber all over Nico’s foot, Robert took his foot out of Nico’s “not done yet” mouth and pushed Nico’s mouth away, back in between his own feet, and placed it on the ground where it was before he started to savor it’s smell and taste close up. He then repeated on Nico’s left foot, minus the smelling and licking. When Nico’s second shoe and sock were off, Robert stood up and extended his hand to his friends and helped him up.

“So we should probably go somewhere else if we’re going to keep doing this” Robert stated. “I don’t know when anyone will come through that door.”

“Yeah, sounds good. You’re feet taste really good too!” Nico felt the need to add. “Like salty chips!”
“Yeah?”
“Yeah! I love salty chips!”
“Hahaha, me too. But not as much as grass.” The boys giggled.
“So where are we going?” Nico asked.
“Up to you!”

Nico chooses to go to…
